name: Digital Analyst
description:
The legendary fashion Brand is looking for a Digital Analyst. Work under civil contract.

In case of your interest please pay attention to all details in the description below and apply in case you are aligned with required experience.

Responsibilities:

  • Web Analytics:
    • Set up the web analytics tools (GTM, GA, Yandex.Metrics)
    • Build the Customer Journey Map (CJM)
    • Build the Purchase Funnel (event analytics)
    • Analyze consumer behavior and conversions (micro & macro) on the website
    • Analyze Landing Pages and banners (consumer engagement and performance)
    • Analyze advertising channels performance, post-click analysis of the advertising campaigns
    • Analyze associated conversions and build the attribution model
    • Visualize data and build analytical reports (daily, weekly, monthly, ad-hoc)
    • Perform A/B tests
  • OMNI Channel Analytics (online & offline):
    • Build the end-to-end analytics system
    • Segment the client database
    • Perform cohort and RFM analysis
  • Prepare technical requirements for the developers team

Requirements:

Education: University Degree (mathematics, economy, engineering)

Experience: 3+ years’ experience in a similar role. Ideally experience in retail ecommerce projects

Technical knowledge:

  • Experience in working with large volumes of data
  • Expert skills in working with GTM, GA, Yandex.Metrics
  • Sound SQL and Excel experience, strong GBQ, Google Sheets, Google Data Studio, Tableaux experience

Other competencies:

  • Understanding of marketing tools: CRM, Paid channels, SEO, Social
  • Understanding of business metrics: CAC, LTV, ROI, Retention Rate, Churn Rate
  • Knowledge of the statistical data analysis
  • Understanding of key performance indicators of marketing channels (CPO, ROI, CRR)
  • Analytical mindset
  • Ability to make decisions and to work without permanent supervision
  • Google Analytics, GTM, Yandex.Metrics certified professional preferred
  • At least Upper intermediate level of English across both spoken and written communications
